name: "A Hero Sits Next Door" Trivia Quiz | 'Family Guy'-  Season 1 | 10 Questions

questions.text: What day is the company softball game?
questions.explanation:
Saturday.

	Peter and his co-workers must defeat a novelty store's team in the company softball tournament.  Last year, they lost and were humiliated with x-ray glasses.

Swanson.

	Joe Swanson, his wife, and his son move into the house next door to the Griffins.  They become regulars on the show.

questions.text: What team is Peter's company opposing in the softball match?
questions.explanation:
Pawtucket Pranksters.

	Peter decides to have his new neighbour Joe play on his team.  When Joe arrives, Peter realizes Joe is in a wheelchair.

questions.text: When did Joe break his legs?
questions.explanation:
Christmas Eve.

	While fighting the Grinch on the roof of an orphanage ten years ago, Joe slipped on a roller skate and fell off the roof.  He has had to live in a wheelchair since then.

questions.text: Where does Peter go to try and become a hero?
questions.explanation:
Bank.

	Peter tries to become a hero after seeing everyone take a liking to Joe.  He decides to stop a bank robbery at Quahog Bank and Trust.

questions.text: What is the name of Joe's son?
questions.explanation:
Kevin.

	Meg begins to have a crush on Kevin, but he doesn't even notice her.  He only begins to talk when she talks about him.

questions.text: What is the name of the teller during the robbery?
questions.explanation:
Tammy.

	The burglars congratulate Tammy on her first hold-up, and Peter uses her in the improvisation game when he takes the robbers' guns.

questions.text: What colour dress does Meg buy when Peter is trying to become a hero?
questions.explanation:
Red.

	Meg buys a red dress because Lois wants Meg to feel better about Kevin not talking to her.  Kevin soon does talk to her because she talks about him.

questions.text: Which band does Joe's son not listen to?
questions.explanation:
Eminem.

	Kevins parents don't like him listening to his bands, but he does anyway.  He also likes listening to Phish.

questions.text: Which character appeared in this episode?
questions.explanation:
Brian.

	Brian appears in every episode as he is a member of the family.  Surprisingly, none of Peter's most popular neighbours attend Joe's party.
